I come from Vietnam. After hearing that India was translated so badly, I was really sad. India is a close friend of Vietnam, as well as the land that I consider my second hometown. Therefore, every day I go online to watch news about the epidemic situation in India and I am very sad that the patients are increasing.In Vietnam, we are ready to send experts as well as support medical equipment to help India. Vietnam is also researching Covid vaccine, but until June, we have only tested the final phase, in July we will begin large-scale production. I really want the Vietnamese Ministry of Health to speed up research to be able to produce vaccines to support India to overcome this difficulty. May India overcome the plague, may the Buddha bless my Indian friends.Vietnam is still poor, but willing to stand side by side with India and support India in all its difficulties. I love you. Vietnam loves India.
Thank you for your kind words. Can't believe someone in Vietnam is so concerned for us. Thank you really

@@KunalKumar-np4ig sentiments between the people of the two Indo-Vietnamese countries were cultivated when India was the first country to visit Vietnam in 1954. India was also one of the few countries that dared to oppose the US during the Vietnam War. sided with Vietnam when China invaded Vietnam in 1979, India also taught Vietnam to make a green revolution to help the Vietnamese people not go hungry. Later when the country was reunified, India also helped with economic development, investment and development as well as helping Vietnam to train pilots, submarine sailors ...India also enthusiastically assists Vietnam in building an information technology network for the Vietnamese government, helping to better manage human resources and society.So we are very grateful to you. Hope you all will be strong and healthy to overcome the pandemic. The whole world is always by your side.
